00097    if(flags & RGB133_VDIF_FLAG_DVI)
00098    {
00099       if(flags & RGB133_VDIF_FLAG_INTERLACED)
00100          return "Interlaced DVI";
00101       else
00102          return "DVI";
00103 
00104    }
00105    else if(flags & RGB133_VDIF_FLAG_VIDEO)
00106    {
00107       if(flags & RGB133_VDIF_FLAG_INTERLACED)
00108          return "Interlaced VideoInput";
00109       else
00110          return "VideoInput";
00111    }
00112    else if(flags & RGB133_VDIF_FLAG_SDI)
00113    {
00114       if(flags & RGB133_VDIF_FLAG_INTERLACED)
00115          return "Interlaced SDI";
00116       else
00117          return "SDI";
00118    }
00119    else if(flags & RGB133_VDIF_FLAG_DVI_DUAL_LINK)
00120    {
00121       return "DVI-DL";
00122    }
00123    else if(flags != RGB133_VDIF_FLAG_NOSIGNAL &&
00124            flags != RGB133_VDIF_FLAG_OUTOFRANGE &&
00125            flags != RGB133_VDIF_FLAG_UNRECOGNISABLE)
00126    {
00127       if(flags & RGB133_VDIF_FLAG_INTERLACED)
00128          return "Interlaced Analogue";
00129       else
00130          return "Analogue";
00131    }
00132 
00133    return "Unknown Video Input";
00134 }

sVWSystemInfo *  pSysInfo

Implementation of readCtrlSystemInfo 

00034 {
00035    int bytes_read = 0;
00036 
00037    memset(pSysInfo, 0, sizeof(sVWSystemInfo));
00038    pSysInfo->magic = VW_MAGIC_SYSTEM_INFO;
00039 
00040    bytes_read = read(fd, pSysInfo, sizeof(sVWSystemInfo));
00041    if (bytes_read <= 0)
00042    {
00043       printf("readCtrlSystemInfo: Failed to read %d bytes of control info into buffer(%p)\n",
00044             sizeof(sVWSystemInfo), pSysInfo);
00045       return -1;
00046    }
00047 
00048    return 0;
00049 }
